channel.title: All religions aside, who would be the most pwnage God to worship and why?
channel.description: The question states it all. My vote is for Dyonisus because, well, he's the God of partying.

item.title: All religions aside, who would be the most pwnage God to worship and why?
item.dc:creator: Zuul
item.description:
Chuck Norris. No wait, Steven Seagal. Fuck I got confused; it’s obviously Snake.Plissken.

On another note, the need for a supreme being is as old as humanity itself. Sitting around a campfire making up stories…shit, even I understand that. There was no TV.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Joe_Freeman
item.description:
Dyeus, the-lord-of-the-skies-kind of god. Like Odin, Zeus, and all that shit OG.

But, I think the real kickass god can’t be imagined like if he was something concrete. He’s everything, that’s why it kicks ass.

item.title: All religions aside, who would be the most pwnage God to worship and why?
item.dc:creator: jerry
item.description:
GordonFreeManz:

God, because… He performs great miracles. He sacrificed his only son for US. And He saved us… Those who do not worship the One God, Jesus Christ, and the Holy Spirit… If you do not WORSHIP any of them what so ever… then your just worshipping demons… Jews are safe, Muslims are safe, Roman-Catholics are safe.

item.title: All religions aside, who would be the most pwnage God to worship and why?
item.dc:creator: Dr_Perky
item.description:
GordonFreeManz:

God, because… He performs great miracles. He sacrificed his only son for US. And He saved us… Those who do not worship the One God, Jesus Christ, and the Holy Spirit… If you do not WORSHIP any of them what so ever… then your just worshipping demons… Jews are safe, Muslims are safe, Roman-Catholics are safe.

If you believe seriously as a believer in an Abrahamic God that ANY other religion is right then you are not a true believer in your faith, because as a Jew you don’t believe that Jesus was the son of God and you also don’t believe in the words of the prophet Mohammad, if you are Muslim you believe that Jesus was not the son of God and you believe in the words of the prophet Mohammad, and as a Roman-Catholic believing anything else after the words of Jesus Christ and his disciples as coming from God is blasphemous.

But then Christianity is the buffet of religions where you get to pick and choose from a bunch of rules what you want to believe.

Read full topic

item.description:
Comrade Tiki:

I’m going to start a religion with four gods to worship: Yahweh, Jehovah, Allah, and Elohim.

I see wut u did thar…

Also: “Sucellos, the ‘good striker’ is usually portrayed as a middle-aged bearded man, with a long-handled hammer, or perhaps a beer barrel suspended from a pole.” (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Celtic_pantheon#Gods_with_hammers)

!!!
